title: Ole Town Cafe - temporarily closed
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Chinese, Thai, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegan starters are in-house-made vegetable egg rolls and corn salsa & chips. Several salads and a grilled portabello sandwich are also available as well as pastas and sides. A casual New Orleans diner feeling with outdoor dining available in the renovated Depot District in Old Town Bay St Louis. Reported temporarily closed while moving to new location; will re-open later - please update Happycow when it re-opens.
